name: Uni Sim
description:
Study Information:

Uni Sim is a narrative game for exploring emotion and immersion in videogames. The purpose of this game is to examine how video games can impact upon mood and behaviour, and which elements of a videogame impact most upon immersion.

The choices you make in the game are not recorded, however the game does include a survey containing questions asking about your experiences while playing the game. The survey data will be used in a research study examining emotion and immersion. 

Please complete in one sitting. It should take 15-20 minutes. 

Your data: The answers you provide to the questionnaire will be collected anonymously and kept securely. 

Contact:  If you have any questions you can contact me at 19092943@stu.mmu.ac.uk
